servinfo.title: Engine Accessory Drive Belt Inspection (Petrol Engine Model)

attention1.ptxt: All inspection and replacement are to be performed with ENGINE NOT RUNNING.

servinfosub.title: Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt (M16A and J20A model)
servinfosub.ptxt: Inspect belt for cracks, cuts, deformation, wear cleanliness and tension. If any defect exists, adjust or replace.

For belt inspection, refer to Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt Tension Inspection and Adjustment (M16A):M16A and J20A or Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt On-Vehicle Inspection (J20A):M16A and J20A .

servinfosub.title: Power Steering Pump and A/C Compressor (If Equipped) Drive Belt (M16A Engine)
servinfosub.ptxt: Inspect belt for cracks, cuts, deformation, wear cleanliness and tension. If any defect exists, adjust or replace.
For inspection, refer to P/S Pump and A/C Compressor Drive Belt Inspection and Adjustment (M16A Model) .

servinfosub.title: Accessory Drive Belt (J24B and N32A model)
servinfosub.ptxt: Inspect belt for cracks, cuts, deformation, wear, cleanliness and tension. If any defect exists, replace.
